name: bildr-tools
description: The place for Bildr scripts to enhance the already awesome functionality of the low-code https://bildr.com developement Studio

scripts.build:prodWithJest: jest && rimraf dist && webpack --env production  && webpack --env development && npm run build:types && npm run bundle-d-ts
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && webpack --env production  && webpack --env development && npm run build:types && npm run bundle-d-ts
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:clean && npm run build:webpack
scripts.release: npm run build:dist && copyfiles -u 1 dist/bildr-plugins.min.js W:/jeroenvanmenen.synology.com && copyfiles -u 1 dist/bildr-plugins.min.js W:/jeroenvanmenen.synology.com/bildr/community-plugins

author: joonix
